channel.title: Shilo Island v2 - Unique Server
channel.description:
Even though I released this, I'm working on v2. :] I started this on a clean Project Insanity base. If you want to help me on this project, just reply on this thread with your msn and we'll talk, must have good pi experience.
Developers: Matt0wn3r - CataclysmRSPS
Well this is the area that [B]everything[/B] will be in. [IMG]http://uploadpad.com/files/shilomap.png[/img]
[B]Skills[/B] (Agility, runecrafting, and farming wont be added - may be in future). [COLOR=Red]Herblore[/COLOR] [COLOR=red]Thieving[/COLOR] [COLOR=red]Crafting[/COLOR] [COLOR=red]Fletching[/COLOR] [COLOR=yellow]Slayer[/COLOR] Mining [COLOR=Green]Smithing[/COLOR] [COLOR=Green]Fishing[/COLOR] [COLOR=Red]Cooking[/COLOR] [COLOR=red]Firemaking[/COLOR] [COLOR=red]Woodcutting[/COLOR]
Media: [IMG]http://uploadpad.com/files/shilo1.png[/img] [IMG]http://uploadpad.com/files/shilo2.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://uploadpad.com/files/shilo3.png[/img] [IMG]http://uploadpad.com/files/shilo4.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://uploadpad.com/files/shilo5.png[/img]
Updates [code]July 6th -All teleports removed -Gnome flying system added, need to change locations still -Added a well that can fill buckets with water bucket emptying too -Home, respawns etc are set -Added general store with working dialogues -You can now get into the smelting room and smelting works -All ladders up and down work
July 7th -Fishing is redone and 100% complete, just a few more fishing spots to add -Gerrant (fishing store) added with dialogues -Fixed exp rates -Added walking across log (can't get anim to work) -Gnomes will now fly you to all corners of island West, East, North, Northwest, and Northeast. -Fixed starting location bug
July 8th -Added npcs (adding a lot more today) -Made stepping stones on waterfall work -A better general store added at northwest part of island with dialogues and shop done -Smithing is now 100% working, the furnace at home works and the anvils on the northwest part of island work 100% perfectly -Changed some items in the shops and fixed a fishing bug -Changed the starting items -Mining has been started -Mining ores have been added to home -Mining is now finished, works good with all ores added -Added a new amulet shop upstairs in one of the buildings, media has been updated
July 10th -Added a food shop, with correct dialogues (up stairs to make places like that worth going to) -Slayer has been started on, LOADS of npcs to add (to make lots of different tasks). -Another fishing spot added -More slayer npcs added, and some tasks edited[/code]

item.title: Shilo Island v2 - Unique Server
item.dc:creator: @CataclysmServer CataclysmServer
item.description:
@CataclysmServer wrote:

This project is on a “stand still” for two reasons.

  1. I have a server now.

  2. I’m clean out of ideas. - Feel free to suggest.

Read full topic

item.title: Shilo Island v2 - Unique Server
item.dc:creator: @CataclysmServer CataclysmServer
item.description:
@CataclysmServer wrote:

Even though I released this, I’m working on v2. :] I started this on a clean Project Insanity base. If you want to help me on this project, just reply on this thread with your msn and we’ll talk, must have good pi experience.

Developers:
Matt0wn3r - CataclysmRSPS

Well this is the area that everything will be in.

shilomap.png464×509

Skills (Agility, runecrafting, and farming wont be added - may be in future).
[COLOR=Red]Herblore[/COLOR]
[COLOR=red]Thieving[/COLOR]
[COLOR=red]Crafting[/COLOR]
[COLOR=red]Fletching[/COLOR]
[COLOR=yellow]Slayer[/COLOR]
Mining
[COLOR=Green]Smithing[/COLOR]
[COLOR=Green]Fishing[/COLOR]
[COLOR=Red]Cooking[/COLOR]
[COLOR=red]Firemaking[/COLOR]
[COLOR=red]Woodcutting[/COLOR]

Media:

shilo1.png760×498


shilo3.png753×323


shilo5.png758×495

Updates

[code]July 6th
-All teleports removed
-Gnome flying system added, need to change locations still
-Added a well that can fill buckets with water bucket emptying too
-Home, respawns etc are set
-Added general store with working dialogues
-You can now get into the smelting room and smelting works
-All ladders up and down work

July 7th
-Fishing is redone and 100% complete, just a few more fishing spots to add
-Gerrant (fishing store) added with dialogues
-Fixed exp rates
-Added walking across log (can’t get anim to work)
-Gnomes will now fly you to all corners of island West, East, North, Northwest, and Northeast.
-Fixed starting location bug

July 8th
-Added npcs (adding a lot more today)
-Made stepping stones on waterfall work
-A better general store added at northwest part of island with dialogues and shop done
-Smithing is now 100% working, the furnace at home works and the anvils on the northwest part of island work 100% perfectly
-Changed some items in the shops and fixed a fishing bug
-Changed the starting items
-Mining has been started
-Mining ores have been added to home
-Mining is now finished, works good with all ores added
-Added a new amulet shop upstairs in one of the buildings, media has been updated

July 10th
-Added a food shop, with correct dialogues (up stairs to make places like that worth going to)
-Slayer has been started on, LOADS of npcs to add (to make lots of different tasks).
-Another fishing spot added
-More slayer npcs added, and some tasks edited[/code]

Read full topic
